about_the_game:
The World Of Yumekakigori


Step into an unconventional text adventure where your choices freely shape the narrative.

In a consciousness-driven world, you've lost your identity and speech. Raven, a mystical being, bestows upon you the power to weave thoughts into shave ice. In an imaginary shave ice shop, your color choices reflect inner musings, addressing customer problems and swaying the story's direction.

Collect novel color blending techniques and their meanings as the story unfolds. Choose colors for shave ice in response to customer inquiries, exploring the connection between this consciousness world, your identity, and the truth lurking beneath the shave ice shop.

Story


  • Lost speech and a muddled memory.
  • Begin with three fundamental colors: Red (Emotion), Yellow (Desire), Blue (Thought).
  • Combine these to express a rich tapestry of emotions, revealing your inner self to visitors.
  • Raven lends a helping wing, but its endgame is a puzzle.

Gameplay


  • Use three fundamental colors of your choice to create shave ice.
  • Progress the story to unlock new recipes and discover the meaning of each shave ice.
  • Through shave ice communication explore characters' story.

How Would Your Color Affects their Destiny?
